classData.comment:
/**
 * Default configuration object.
 * Defines the structure and default values for the server configuration.
 */
classData.description: Default configuration object. Defines the structure and default values for the server configuration.
classData.name: defaultConfig

classData.description: Automatically synchronize the knowledge base on startup.
classData.name: autoSync

classData.description: Global debug flag for all MCP servers.
classData.name: debug

classData.comment:
/**
     * A dummy embedding function to satisfy the ChromaDB API when embeddings are provided manually.
     *
     * NOTE: This verbose structure is strictly required to prevent the ChromaDB client from
     * flagging this as a "legacy" function, which triggers a persistent console warning:
     * "No embedding function configuration found for collection..."
     *
     * The `chromadb` library checks for the presence of `name`, `getConfig`, and `buildFromConfig`.
     * If any are missing, it defaults to legacy mode.
     * @returns {Object} The dummy embedding function satisfying IEmbeddingFunction
     */
classData.description:
A dummy embedding function to satisfy the ChromaDB API when embeddings are provided manually.

NOTE: This verbose structure is strictly required to prevent the ChromaDB client from flagging this as a "legacy" function, which triggers a persistent console warning: "No embedding function configuration found for collection..."

The chromadb library checks for the presence of name, getConfig, and buildFromConfig. If any are missing, it defaults to legacy mode.

returns.description: The dummy embedding function satisfying IEmbeddingFunction

classData.name: dummyEmbeddingFunction

classData.description: The hostname of the ChromaDB server for the knowledge base.
classData.name: host

classData.description: The port the ChromaDB server for the knowledge base is listening on.
classData.name: port

classData.description: The local persistence path for the agent knowledge-base server.
classData.name: path

classData.description: The path to the generated knowledge base JSONL file.
classData.name: dataPath

classData.description: The path to the generated class hierarchy JSON file.
classData.name: hierarchyPath

classData.description: The name of the ChromaDB collection for the knowledge base.
classData.name: collectionName

classData.description: The name of the Google Generative AI model for content generation.
classData.name: modelName

classData.description: The name of the Google Generative AI model for text embeddings.
classData.name: embeddingModel

classData.description: The number of chunks to process in a single batch when embedding.
classData.name: batchSize

classData.description: Delay in milliseconds between batches to avoid rate limits.
classData.name: batchDelay

classData.description: The maximum number of times to retry a failed embedding batch.
classData.name: maxRetries

classData.description: The number of results to fetch from ChromaDB for a query.
classData.name: nResults

classData.description: Weights used in the query scoring algorithm.
classData.name: queryScoreWeights

classData.comment:
/**
 * @summary Configuration manager for the Knowledge Base MCP server.
 *
 * Configuration manager for the Knowledge Base MCP server.
 * Supports loading configuration from a custom file and merging with defaults.
 *
 * @class Neo.ai.mcp.server.knowledge-base.Config
 * @extends Neo.core.Base
 * @singleton
 */
classData.summary:
Configuration manager for the Knowledge Base MCP server.

Configuration manager for the Knowledge Base MCP server.
Supports loading configuration from a custom file and merging with defaults.
classData.name: Config

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} className='Neo.ai.mcp.server.knowledge-base.Config'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: className

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {Boolean} singleton=true
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: singleton

classData.comment:
/**
     * The current configuration object.
     * Starts with defaults and can be updated via load().
     * @member {Object} data
     */
classData.description: The current configuration object. Starts with defaults and can be updated via load().
classData.name: data

classData.comment:
/**
     * Initializes the configuration object by deep cloning the defaults.
     * @param {Object} config
     */
classData.description: Initializes the configuration object by deep cloning the defaults.
classData.name: construct

classData.description: Loads configuration from a JSON file and merges it with defaults.
classData.name: load
